section.title: Removing a Storage Domain
section.para: You have a storage domain in your data center that you want to remove from the virtualized environment.

step.para: Click the Storage resource tab and select the appropriate storage domain in the results list.
Move the domain into maintenance mode to deactivate it.
Detach the domain from the data center.
Click Remove to open the Remove Storage confirmation window.
Select a host from the list.
Click OK to remove the storage domain and close the window.

section.para: The storage domain is permanently removed from the environment.
